item.title: You Won't Believe What Happened at the Pernell Funeral Home: An Obituary That Will Leave You Speechless!
item.description: Introduction The Pernell Funeral Home in the small town of Eugene, Oregon, recently experienced an event that will leave you speechless On August 19th, 2019, the Pernell Funeral Home hosted a funeral for a beloved member of the community, and the obituary that was read that day was unlike any other Background of the Pernell Funeral Home The Pernell Funeral Home was established in Eugene, Oregon in 132 by the late Mr.
